name: 李宜桓
objective: 本課程具體介紹各式有機材分析技術。內容有紫外線/可見光光譜、螢光/磷光光譜、紅外線光譜、拉曼光譜、核磁共振儀、質譜儀、層析、熱分析、光學顯微鏡影像分析、電子顯微鏡影像分析及原子力顯微鏡等。並透過多項實驗證與闡述分析技術於各種有機材之運用，包含能源、先進材等相關領域。修習本課程的學生可系統性地建立各式有機材分析的理論架構，有助於未來研究與就業方面之發展。
schedule:
1. (1st week)                     Introduction 
2. (2nd and 3rd weeks)      UV & VIS 
3. (4th and 5th weeks)       IR 
4. (6th week)                    Raman 
5. (7th week)                    NMR
6. (8th week)                    MS

(9th week)  Mid-term Exam 

7. (10th and 11th weeks)   GC/LC 
8. (12th and 13th weeks)   Thermal Methods 
9. (14th week)                  Optical Microscopy 
10. (15th and 16th weeks) Electron Microscopy 
11. (17th week)                Atomic Force Microscopy

(18th week)  Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
出席與作業成績 30%
materials:
1. Principles of Instrumental Analysis (D.A. Skoog, 7th. ed.)
2. Gregory Timp, 1998, Nanotechnology, Spring-Verlag, New York, Inc
3. Sergei N. Magonov, Myung-Hwan Whanbo, Surface Analysis withSTM and AFM, New York, Inc
